description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

Your nanites can make your explosives even deadlier by clustering your grenades and even potentially replicating them. When using your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.LLNp1urkLncOxgsb]{Gear Array (Ex)} to form a weapon that uses grenades as ammunition, you can give the weapon the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.Nrf6oy9pJwcEmryP.JournalEntryPage.nXkFsyxk7Vybdn7G#cluster]{Cluster (5 ft.)} special weapon property. This increases to cluster (10 ft.) at level 15. When you use a weapon formed from your gear array to make a cluster attack with non-magical grenades with an item level no greater than your level, you can spend a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.vh6n0Ad3lamOJXpV]{Nanite Surge (Ex)} to reduce the number of grenades expended by 1.
